articles.title: Preorders Are Live for Lenovo Legion Go 2 Gaming Handhelds - IGN
articles.description: Lenovo's Legion Go 2 gaming handhelds are now available to preorder at Best Buy. With a release date of October 31, you can get an AMD Ryzen Z2 model (16GB RAM) for $1,099.99 or an AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme model (32GB RAM) for $1,349.99.
